Installation¶

ENIGMA TOOLBOX is available in Python and MATLAB!

Python installation

Matlab installation

ENIGMA TOOLBOX has the following dependencies:

  • numpy

  • pandas

  • vtk

  • nibabel

  • nilearn

  • matplotlib

The ENIGMA TOOLBOX can be directly downloaded from Github as follows:

git clone https://github.com/MICA-MNI/ENIGMA.git
cd ENIGMA
python setup.py install

ENIGMA TOOLBOX was tested with MATLAB R2017b.

To install the MATLAB toolbox simply download and unzip the GitHub toolbox, and run the following command in MATLAB:

addpath('/path/to/ENIGMA/matlab/')

ENIGMA TOOLBOX is available in Python and MATLAB!

Python installation

Matlab installation

ENIGMA TOOLBOX has the following dependencies:

  • numpy

  • pandas

To install the MATLAB toolbox simply download and unzip the GitHub toolbox, and run the following command in MATLAB:
